name: Sentimental Genie
about: A full stack web and mobile app that uses OpenAI's GPT-3 AI model to generate a sentiment analysis (positive, negative or neutral) based on the user's input. It is built with React Native, Node.js, Express.js.

name: TaskHero
about: TaskHero is a mobile application that helps users to create a list of tasks that they need to complete. It is built with React Native, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.

name: LineupWiz
about: A web application that helps fantasy football players to create the best lineup for their team. It is built with React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.

name: AquaTrack
about: AquaTrack is a mobile application that helps users track their water intake based on a set goal. It is built with React Native, Node.js.

name: AI Receipt Recognizer
about: A Python program that extracts key information and returns structured JSON data. It is built with Python, Azure Storage, Form Recognizer's receipt model.

name: MindBoost
about: A web application that helps users to create a list of affirmations that they can use to motivate themselves. It is built with React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.

name: Hex Generator
about: Hex generator is a web application that helps users to generate a random hex color.
